description: I need the notes to stick to the screen, above all the windows, but that doesn't happen! What's the point of the program being called Sticky Notes if it doesn't stick?!

This was a good note app, but now it keeps popping up random notes made up of random characters on my desktop, I just closed about 75 of them. No idea how to stop this from happening. Looking for a new note app now.

I loved the 12.3 version of knotes, font styles, font colours, font sizes, and it looked great on the side of my kde desktop.
The new version however sucks, no font colours, font sizes or styles.
Not to mention how flaky it is to open the side bar for resize or dragging.
I would love to install the older version but not sure if it will cause issues with the rest of the kde desktop.
summary: The new version is a shadow of the 12.3 version

software centre showed the size to be half mb but then downloaded more than 100 mb and took ages to install.
If you want not to lose ur notes, avoid using this dummy app.

I love this one. Infinitely better than the Windows stickies.  Import, export, mail, etc. Checkmark lists with a click. Spell checker.  Set alarms! Move to particular workspaces.

They've thought of so much. Great job. Keep coming up with new ideas.

Only fault (I have anyway) is I can't make it speak the notes.. but.. so what?
summary: Absolute best sticky notes I've seen

Do does not work ever and make system crash
Love it! Works great.

Well, this is my favorite sticky note program by far, but... I have to keep shutting it down and restarting it to get my notes to show up. Not only that, it seems to leave both instances of the program running according to the System Monitor.

I've tried uninstalling it, reienstalling it, using sudo apt-get autoremove, etc - but, the same issue persists.

So, I've decided to uninstall it for now and look for another sticky note program. Bummer...
cant be used without akanodi personal manager. :/

I tried out the program as an alternative to the zhornsoftware windows program 'Stickies' on windows, and once I got the program working my experience was hot garbage.

The interface is very finicky, there is not a good way to organize your notes if you have a sizable number of notes, new notes are by default saved to a hidden folder that I had to go out of my way to un-hide just to make notes that can be visibly seen, once created the notes can not be moved or resized making the calendar integration function (witch is advertised on the app page) unusable, and there is no way make notes hover over top of other programs.

ON TOP OF THAT multiple program functions simply do not work at all. Saving a note to the desktop results in the program saving nothing, the alarm function dos'nt trigger any alarm or notification even after the time they are meant to go off comes and go's.

I would not recommend this program to anyone

I appreciate that the program was written by someone who used their valuable time. I do think that if more time was spent “polishing” the program it could have turned into a real “gem”.

I wanted the program to be good but I couldn’t even resize the sticky note itself and it was much too large to be useful on the desktop where I needed it and the fonts are way too small to be easily read.

I don’t understand why someone would spend this much time on a program that is not very useful (just read the comments). If just a little more time was spent “tweaking” the program, it could have went from a program that wasn’t too useful to an outstanding program.

I hope that someone takes this program to the next level because these Sticky Notes programs can be very useful if used properly.
This app even now starting, because of dependency: Akonadi, which also doesn't work

this app for RTL languages (such persian and Arabic) isnot good.and
yesterday my notes reasonless and I could not recover them. also I highighted my text but I couldent remove colour!
I am a programmer, and this app crashed my mysql server, and it took a while to recover. Do not reccommended.

This app will pretend to work really weel for a while and then one day you will press the hotkey to show your notes and they will abe gone. You will not be able to find them in your system. They are just gone. Woopsie-daisy

Knotes fonctionne très bien en natif avec KDE mais très mal sous Gnome 3.28.2 : beugue de suppression de note, beugue de couleur de fond, beugue d'icône, beugue à la suppression du logiciel. L'intégration est à revoir.
Très pratique !

Beaucoup d'options, peut-être trop. Fait le job dans l'ensemble mais peut paraître intimidant - Conseillé de fouiller dans les paramètres et d'aller faire un tour sur docs.kde.org et regarder comment Knotes fonctionne
fonctionne pas dans gnome
KNotes est un programme qui vous permet d'avoir l'équivalent électronique d'une plaisanterie potache.
Заметки, как в windows 10. Непонятно почему, но после выключения/включения дисплея на панели задач появляется второй значок приложения. Что это за магия?
Подтверждаю: после выхода из сна появляется второй индикатор на панели (Ubuntu 18.04.4, GNOME 3.28.2, Dash to panel).
